name: tenoxui
description: Tenox UI is a Utiliy-First CSS Framework with small and lightweight size and fast, most of its class is built in Javascript.

scripts.build-js: terser src/js/tenoxui.js -o dist/js/tui.min.js -c -m --mangle --source-map url='tui.min.js.map' && terser src/js/lib/property.js -o dist/js/lib/property.js -c -m --mangle && cp src/js/tenoxui.js dist/js/tui.js
scripts.build-mjs: terser src/js/tenoxui.esm.js -o dist/js/tui.esm.min.js -c -m --mangle --source-map url='tui.esm.min.js.map' && cp src/js/tenoxui.esm.js dist/js/tui.esm.js
scripts.build-css: cleancss src/css/tenoxui.css -o dist/css/tui.min.css --source-map && cp src/css/tenoxui.css dist/css/tui.css && cp src/css/lib.css dist/css/
scripts.build-all: npm run build-js && npm run build-mjs && npm run build-css && prettier --write dist/js/tui.js dist/js/tui.esm.js

author: NOuSantx
